channel.title: TRISO-X Fab. Part 70
channel.generator: Function write_rss() in R package nrcadams

item.title: 08/22/2024 Call between the NRC and TRISO-X staff to have a discussion regarding the NRC requests for additional information (RAIs) related to the chemical safety review of the TRISO-X License Application.
item.author: NRC/NMSS

item.title: 09/09/2024 Call between the NRC and TRISO-X staff to have a discussion regarding the NRC requests for additional information (RAIs) related to the hydrology review of the TRISO-X License Application.
item.author: NRC/NMSS

item.title: 08/28/2024 Call between the NRC and TRISO-X staff to continue discussions regarding the NRC request to supplement the requests for additional information (RAIs) related to management measures.
item.author: NRC/NMSS

item.title: 08/27/2024 Virtual Meeting Between the U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission and TRISO-X, LLC to discuss the Structural Request for Additional Information-2-2, "(Building) Risk Category" supplement.
item.author: NRC/NMSS

item.title: 08/28/2024 Call between the NRC and TRISO-X staff to discuss draft responses to the requests for additional information related to the structural building risk category.
item.author: NRC/NMSS
